00020 // This is only necessary for pre-1.36 Boost.Test.
00021 #if BOOST_VERSION < 103600
00022 
00023 #include <boost/test/floating_point_comparison.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/test/auto_unit_test.hpp>
00025 
00026 // This depends on other macros.  Probably not a great idea... but it works, and
00027 // we only need it for ancient Boost versions.
00028 #define BOOST_REQUIRE_GE( L, R ) \
00029     BOOST_REQUIRE_EQUAL( (L >= R), true )
00030 
00031 #define BOOST_REQUIRE_NE( L, R ) \
00032     BOOST_REQUIRE_EQUAL( (L != R), true )
00033 
00034 #define BOOST_REQUIRE_LE( L, R ) \
00035     BOOST_REQUIRE_EQUAL( (L <= R), true )
00036 
00037 #define BOOST_REQUIRE_LT( L, R ) \
00038     BOOST_REQUIRE_EQUAL( (L < R), true )
00039 
00040 #define BOOST_REQUIRE_GT( L, R ) \
00041     BOOST_REQUIRE_EQUAL( (L > R), true )
00042 
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 #endif
